item.title: Podcast on Drug Shortage Mitigation
item.description: ► 0:00 / 0:00 1 1.25 1.5 Your browser does not support the audio element. To make [our research on drug shortage mitigation and prevention](/projects/pharmaceutical-supply-chain-resilience/) accessible to a broader audience, we created an AI-generated podcast. The podcast discusses our findings on pharmaceutical supply chain resilience (see the [project page](/projects/pharmaceutical-supply-chain-resilience/) for a list of publications). Additionally, the podcast provides a broad overview of our current research focus: developing a shortage mitigation system for pharmaceutical supply chains called ARIADNE.

item.title: Paper on Supply Chain Resilience Published in Science Advances
item.description: Excited to share our research published in Science Advances, focusing on a vital aspect of modern logistics: pharmaceutical supply chain resilience (Link to Paper ðŸ“‘). The COVID-19 pandemic and subsequent global events have underscored the critical need to enhance supply chain resilience. To address this challenge, our study introduces the concept of ‘reroute flexibility,’ best understood through an analogy to a road network. Picture a distribution network for products as a network of roads and intersections.
